settings.promo_text: Description of promotion with lots of details.

settings.title: Improved Hormonal Regulation
settings.text: Soy contains estrogen-like compounds called isoflavones. Some studies suggest these compounds can promote the growth of cancer cells and reduce thyroid function by disturbing the body’s careful balance of hormones. With soy-free meal kits from Table & Twine, you don’t have to worry about any of these issues.

settings.title: Better Vitamin and Mineral Absorption
settings.text: Soybeans also contain a high amount of phytic acid, which binds to certain nutrients and makes them harder to absorb. Fortunately, with a soy-free meal subscription in Raleigh, impaired vitamin and mineral absorption will be a thing of the past.

settings.title: More Convenient, Exciting Food
settings.text: When faced with a dietary restriction, many people get stuck in a rut – eating the same few dishes every day. But when you order soy-free meals from Table & Twine, you benefit from creative, thoughtfully-curated menus that change each week.

settings.section_heading: Why Choose a Soy-Free Meal Kit?
settings.text: Our chefs are passionate about food and the role it plays in our lives. That’s why they develop new and exciting soy-free recipes each week. From artisan street tacos to smoked chicken wings, these recipes are sure to please your palette. Other benefits of Raleigh soy-free meal kits include:

100% Soy-Free: Our chefs take the time to develop meals that contain absolutely no soy. Plus, since these meals are prepared separately from meals that do contain soy, you don’t have to worry about cross-contamination.

Savory Spices: At Table & Twine, we think food should be fun and exciting – not boring. That’s why our recipes take inspiration from southern fare as well as international cuisine. Expect comforting, familiar flavors as well as bold, brilliant spices.

Seasonal Produce: Unlike our competitors, we curate recipes based on what’s in season. Rather than import fruits and vegetables from South America or Asia, we rely on local growers to provide us with the freshest produce possible. This adds unbelievable flavor to every meal.

Delicious Sides: To give customers a truly personalized culinary experience, our chefs curate side dishes and dessert pairings for every soy-free entrée. From salads to pies, we have thought of it all.

settings.heading: {{ collection.metafields.custom.second_heading.value }}
settings.heading2: What To Expect From Our Soy-Free Meal Service
settings.text2: Raleigh residents love our soy-free meal kits because we understand how to prepare healthy and convenient dishes.

settings.title: Do I have a soy allergy?
settings.text: A soy allergy can cause a variety of symptoms like wheezing, abdominal pain, and hives. The best way to determine if you have an allergy is to consult your doctor.

settings.title: Should I avoid soy even if I don’t have an intolerance?
settings.text: Some studies suggest that soy can cause hormonal imbalance. That being said, avoiding this ingredient could lower your risk for certain cancers, lead to improved thyroid function, and even promote gut health. But before you cut out soy, touch base with your doctor.

settings.title: Are soy-free meals healthier?
settings.text: Soy-free meals are healthier for people with soy allergies. But Table & Twine’s soy-free meal kits can also benefit customers who want to improve hormonal balance.

settings.title: What will come in my Raleigh soy-free meal kit?
settings.text: Your soy-free meal subscription will include all the ingredients you need to prepare a delicious, five-star meal.

settings.title: Would I benefit from a soy-free meal subscription service?
settings.text: Adopting better eating habits can be hard. Luckily, Table & Twine makes healthy eating easy. Just browse our soy-free menu, pick your favorites, and we’ll ship them right to your door. Even better, each recipe takes less than 15 minutes to prepare.

settings.heading: Heating Instructions
settings.text: Preparing an allergy-friendly meal by Table & Twine is simple! Just scan the QR code on your meal’s packaging for easy-to-follow heating instructions. These instructions are also available online.
